data.Title: Google Core Update Expected in Coming Weeks
data.Description: Google has announced that the next core update to its search algorithm is expected to roll out in the coming weeks.

data.Title: Google Tests AI-Powered Features for Search and Local Results
data.Description: Google is experimenting with several new AI-driven features for search, including AI-organized local search results and a return of the "AI Overview" button.

data.Title: Google's Web Crawler Simulates "Idle" to Improve JavaScript Rendering
data.Description: Google's web crawler now simulates "idle" states to better render JavaScript-heavy websites, potentially improving the indexing of deferred content.

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Chat Feature Disabled
data.Description: Google has disabled the new chat feature within Google Business Profiles. Users are advised to download their chat history.

data.Title: Google May Offer Publishers More Control Over Discover Feed Content
data.Description: Google is considering giving publishers the ability to exclude specific content from appearing in the Google Discover feed.

data.Title: Google Notes on Search Experiment Ends
data.Description: Google has officially ended its "Notes on Search" experiment, which allowed users to add notes to search results.

data.Title: Google's Handling of AI-Generated Content Questioned
data.Description: Concerns are being raised about Google's ability to effectively detect and handle websites that heavily rely on AI-generated content.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Feature Shows Decline in Reddit and Quora Citations
data.Description: A new report suggests that Google's AI Overviews are displaying fewer citations from sources like Reddit and Quora.

data.Title: Google May Be Expanding Rollout of 3D/AR Images in Search
data.Description: There are indications that Google is expanding the availability of 3D/AR images in search results beyond the initial beta program.

data.Title: Google Downplays Importance of Disavow Tool
data.Description: Google's John Mueller has stated that website owners should not be overly concerned about having large disavow files or removing them.

data.Title: Schema.org Receives Design Update
data.Description: The Schema.org website has been updated with a new design and an updated validator tool.

data.Title: Taboola Partners with Apple to Power Native Advertising
data.Description: Taboola has announced a deal with Apple to provide native advertising within the Apple News and Apple Stocks apps.

data.Title: AI Used to Analyze Payment Processing Statements
data.Description: AI tools are being developed to help businesses decipher and analyze complex credit card processing statements.

data.Title: Agencies Grapple with Data Security and Fairness in the Age of AI
data.Description: Marketing agencies are navigating the challenges of data security, stability, and fairness as they increasingly adopt AI tools.

data.Title: Concerns Raised Over Google Privacy Sandbox Terms of Service
data.Description: Advertising executives are expressing concerns about Google's Privacy Sandbox terms of service, particularly regarding potential liability for advertisers during outages.
